entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
